column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My siblings and I went for dinner after my sister strongly recommended it as one of her favorite steak houses. As soon as you walk in
column2: you're surrounded with dark wooden walls
column3: chandeliers and big leather chairs. We had reservations for 830 pm but we got there at 730 pm thinking we'd wait but we were seated immediately. Staff was nice
column4: attentive to us and to the tiny details of our needs and they made excellent recommendations.
